languages.text: "Будь Оптикон-22 жив, сейчас сказал бы, что победа заставляет его испытывать счастье и еще шестьдесят его синонимов".
"If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure, along with three scores of synonyms for it."
languages.original_text: "Будь Оптикон-22 жив, сейчас сказал бы, что победа заставляет его испытывать счастье и еще шестьдесят его синонимов".

traits.locale_text: "If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure along with three scores of synonyms for it."
"If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure along with three scores of synonyms for it."
"If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure along with three scores of synonyms for it."
"If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure along with three scores of synonyms for it."
"If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure, along with three scores of synonyms for it."
"If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure, along with three scores of synonyms for it."

languages.text: “如果奥普蒂孔22号还活着的话，他肯定会说这场胜利给他带来了欢乐，之后再说出几十个同义词。”
languages.original_text: "If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure, along with three scores of synonyms for it."

traits.locale_text: “如果奥普蒂孔22号还活着的话，他肯定会说这场胜利给他带来了欢乐，之后再说出几十个同义词。”

languages.text: « Si Opticon-22 était là, il dirait que cette victoire lui fait chaud au cœur, avec une ribambelle de synonymes derrière. »
languages.original_text: "If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure, along with three scores of synonyms for it."

traits.locale_text: « Si Opticon-22 était là, il dirait que cette victoire lui fait chaud au cœur, avec une ribambelle de synonymes derrière. »

languages.text: 「もしオプティコン-22がここにいたら、この勝利を喜んでとうとうと語っていただろう」
languages.original_text: "If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure, along with three scores of synonyms for it."

traits.locale_text: 「もしオプティコン-22がここにいたら、この勝利を喜んでとうとうと語っていただろう」

languages.text: «Si Opticon-22 estuviera aquí, necesitaría unas sesenta barras solo para los sinónimos de placer».
languages.original_text: "If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure, along with three scores of synonyms for it."

traits.locale_text: «Si Opticon-22 estuviera aquí, necesitaría unas sesenta barras solo para los sinónimos de placer».

languages.text: "Wäre Opticon-22 hier, würde er sagen, dass dieser Sieg ihm Freude bereitet hat — und noch drei Dutzend Synonyme dafür finden."
languages.original_text: "If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure, along with three scores of synonyms for it."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre Opticon-22 hier, würde er sagen, dass dieser Sieg ihm Freude bereitet hat — und noch drei Dutzend Synonyme dafür finden."

languages.text: "Opticon-22 burada olsaydı zaferin onu memnun ettiğini söyler, hatta bunu en az üç anlamdaşı sözcük ile ifade ederdi."
languages.original_text: "If Opticon-22 were here, he would say that this victory has brought him pleasure, along with three scores of synonyms for it."
